Intro to Statistical Modeling Ch.1 Problem 1.11
========================================================
```{r include=FALSE}
require(mosaic)
require(ScoreR)
startProblem("SM-01-AC1-03-SD")
```
<code>1e6</code> and <code>10e5</code> are two different ways of writing one-million.  Write 5 more different forms of one-million using scientific notation.

`r I(textItem(name="scinotation", rows=6, totalPts=2))`

<aside>
ANSWER: All of the following are possible ways of writing one-million in scientific notation.

<code>
.0001e10     
.001e9     
.01e8     
.1e7     
1e6     
10e5     
100e4     
1000e3     
10000e2     
100000e1      
1000000e0     
10000000e-1     
</code>

and so on...

</aside>

`r I(endProblem())`
